{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=SR20000G |revision= |upc=850214003263 |ean= |asin=B0084ZYI88 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/31/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Loopcomm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=extender,repeater |fcc_id=ZTT-SR20000G |ic_id=10233A-SR20000G |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8198 |cpu1_cspeed=620 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445EM2I-10G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-S6C |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192DR |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=Amped_Rep_2.4GHz,Amped_Rep_5.0GHz |default_ssid_regex=^Amped_Rep_2.4GHz$,,,^Amped_Rep_5.0GHz$ |default_ip=192.168.1.240 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F8:7B:8C |oui_eth=F8:7B:8C }} ''High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Dual Band Repeater''
[http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/sr20000g.html Product page] This device shares the same hardware as the [[Amped Wireless R20000G]]. The OEM of this device is Loopcomm. Probable F8:7B:8C OUIs The device uses 2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SE5004L_DS.pdf SiGe SE5004L] power amplifiers for the 5GHz radio and 2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SE2576L_DS.pdf SiGe SE2576L] power amplifiers for the 2.4GHz radio. [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31791-amped-wireless-extender-does-both-bands-at-once Amped Wireless Extender Does Both Bands At Once - SmallNetBuilder] [http://www.ebay.com/itm/9dBi-RP-SMA-Antennas-2-for-Amped-Dual-Band-Repeater-Range-Extender-SR20000G-/350672551699 ''mhzkid'''s antenna kit listing for this device on eBay] (w/ internal photos) :5GHz Radio: RTL8192DR ::2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=970 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE5004L / 5004L 5GHz 26dBm power amplifier ICs] :2.4GHz Radio: RTL8192CE ::2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=953 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2576L / 2576L 2.4GHz 26dBm power amplifier ICs] :"LOO0070 REV:1.3" is silkscreened on the board. :Flash chip appears to be a 8MB '''Macronix''' MX25L6445EM2I-10G (or similar) :RAM chip appears to be a 64MB '''Hynix''' H5PS5162GFR-S6C Per the FCC label, the default SSIDs are '''Amped_Rep_2.4GHz''' and '''Amped_Rep_5.0GHz'''. The default WPA PSK is '''wireless'''.
